The short answer is no. Advanced SystemCare crack 12.3.0.335 activation key 2019 is neither safe nor legal to use.
 
First of all, using a cracked software is a violation of the intellectual property rights of the software developer. It is considered as software piracy, which is a serious crime that can result in legal consequences such as fines or imprisonment.
 
Secondly, using a cracked software can expose your PC to various threats such as viruses, malware, spyware, ransomware, adware, etc. These malicious programs can damage your system files, steal your personal information, encrypt your data, display annoying ads, or even take over your PC.
 
Thirdly, using a cracked software can compromise the performance and stability of your PC. A cracked software may not be compatible with your system or other programs, causing errors, crashes, freezes, or slowdowns. It may also interfere with the normal functioning of Advanced SystemCare, preventing it from cleaning and optimizing your PC properly.
